p: The overall workflow for our approach to least-cost modelling is presented in Fig. 6. To account for a changing climate, we first interpolated mean annual temperature grids to represent incremental changes in temperature over the 90 year time period. These interpolated temperature grids ( n=31) represent mean annual temperature on about three year increments between the start (1995) and end date (2085) and assume a linear trend in changes in temperature over this time period ( Fig. 6a).
